root.message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 14-5-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: 14.5 Until 2020, conserve at least 10% of coastal and marine areas, in accordance with national and international legislation, and based on the best available scientific information
14.5 Até 2020, conservar pelo menos 10% das zonas costeiras e marinhas, de acordo com a legislação nacional e internacional, e com base na melhor informação científica disponível
